price: ߥߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ ߟߋ߫ ߣߊ߬ ߛߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߘߊ߲߫ ߠߊ߫ ߓߊ߬؟ ߍ߲߬ߍ߲߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߟߊߒߠߦߊߓߊ߯ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: am khalaqū al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bal lā yūqinūna
